author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Vertical shower wall tile tips…I’m almost done tiling this wall but I have to cap it. So I’m using Schluter JOLLY in matte black. I anchor it to the wall with thin-set mortar and ensure it’s tight against the tile edge. The final step is to add T-Lock and clean the tile. For more tile tips and full step by step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Vertical Shower Wall Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #diy #homerepairtutor
